value.title: What the heck are BUILD PERMISSIONS in Power BI?!?
value.excerpt: Adam look at Power BI build permissions with shared datasets. Taking the mystery out of how you can interact with datasets and know what to do if you can't use it. This also looks at how Power BI free users can use shared datasets with Power BI Premium.  ******** LET'S CONNECT! ********  -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: Power BI Financial Dashboard: Frequency x Reach x Yield = Revenue (The F.R.Y. approach)
value.excerpt: Let's do something unique for building a Financial Dashboard using Power BI. We would use the F.R.Y. approach (Frequency, Reach, Yield) to analyze our revenue numbers.  You can also use the F.R.Y. approach to analyze any other performance metric. Leave a comment and let me know how it went for you?
